name: grc-platform
description: Global AI-powered Governance, Risk, and Compliance Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:ai
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
